overview: Anime or Japanese Animation is a cultural phenomenon that didn’t stop in Japan. It has influenced films from Speed Racer to the Animatrix. What do these story lines teach? Are they uplifting for the Christian or are they bringing a tidal wave of deception to the mind of children and adults? The animes discussed in this series attack Biblical truth and entice the viewers to rebel against the God of heaven. While filled with adult themes, discover why it doesn’t stop there and spills over into theology.
title: Dark Secrets of Anime Exposed
